Connecting with an expert over the phone might sound old-fashioned but some say it can be the fastest way to solve your problems. JustAnswer connects people with 13,000 experts-on-demand to answer a wide range of everyday questions in 150 categories ranging from legal, tech, accounting, home improvement and more. NBCâ€™s Vicky Nguyen reports for TODAY.Feb. 7, 2025
